articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Why the horror from weapons used in mass killings won't lead to them being banned
articles.description: Yet another massacre is yielding horrific descriptions of body-shattering carnage from the killing machines of choice for America's mass shooters.

articles.title: In pictures: 4th of July shooting in Highland Park, Illinois
articles.description: A mass shooting at an Independence Day parade Monday left at least seven people dead, wounded dozens more and sparked a manhunt for a gunman who fired on unsuspecting attendees from a rooftop, authorities said.
articles.content:
A woman views the candles and flowers left for the victims of the July 4th parade shooting on Tuesday, July 5, 2022 in Highland Park, Illinois.
Updated 11:02 PM ET, Tue July 5, 2022
A woman views t… [+1228 chars]

articles.title: Highland Park, Illinois, mayor knew July 4th parade shooting suspect as a child - CNN Video
articles.description: Highland Park, Illinois, Mayor Nancy Rotering speaks with CNN's Adrienne Broaddus about Robert E. Crimo III, the suspect in the deadly shooting during the city's July 4th parade that left 6 people dead and dozens injured.

articles.author: Shimon Prokupecz, Matthew J. Friedman
articles.title: Uvalde mayor says he fears a cover-up of investigation into school massacre and calls on Texas Gov. Abbott to intervene
articles.description: Uvalde Mayor Don McLaughlin told CNN he's lost faith in Texas leaders investigating how law enforcement responded to the shooting that killed 19 children and two adults at Robb Elementary.
articles.content: Uvalde Mayor Don McLaughlin told CNN hes lost faith in Texas leaders investigating how law enforcement responded to the shooting at his towns elementary school that killed 19 children and two adults.… [+4953 chars]

articles.author: Opinion by Jill Filipovic
articles.title: Opinion: Guns aren't a debate. They're a battle over what kind of America we want
articles.description: Every shooting -- not just the ones that make national news -- should have us reevaluating our wildly lax gun laws, writes Jill Fiilipovic, but one happening at a public celebration of America itself should have Americans asking: Is this what we want our coun…
articles.content: Jill Filipovic is a journalist based in New York and author of the book "OK Boomer, Let's Talk: How My Generation Got Left Behind." Follow her on Twitter. The opinions expressed in this commentary ar… [+6839 chars]

articles.author: Sara Murray and Jason Morris, CNN
articles.title: Giuliani, Eastman, Graham among those subpoenaed in Georgia election probe
articles.description: The latest raft of subpoenas marks a new phase of grand jury activity that reaches into Trump's inner circle.

articles.title: After string of Supreme Court setbacks, Democrats wonder whether Biden White House is capable of urgency moment demands
articles.description: Debra Messing was fed up. The former "Will & Grace" star was among dozens of celebrity Democratic supporters and activists who joined a call with White House aides last Monday to discuss the Supreme Court overturning Roe v. Wade.
